SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Class CardFace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.CardFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pluggable, ResourcesProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
KingdomCardFace, StarterCardFace
public abstract class CardFace extends Object implements Pluggable, ResourcesProvider
The base class of a face of a playing card (Resource, Gold, or Starter cards). The face of the card is the actual functional component of the card in the game. Every card that can be placed on the playing board has two faces (front and back) and the visible face of the card when placed on the playing board produces some effects for the players (e.g. gives points, gives resources, gives items, give target points at the end of the game, add new free positions on the board, etc...).

  • Constructor Details

    • CardFace

      protected CardFace(CardCorner topRight, CardCorner bottomRight, CardCorner bottomLeft, CardCorner topLeft)
      Creates a card face with the specified corners. In order to set a non-visible corner, pass null to the desired parameter.
      Parameters:
      topRight - The top-right corner.
      bottomRight - The bottom-right corner.
      bottomLeft - The bottom-left corner.
      topLeft - The top-left corner.
